author: alita85
content: heads up that I just merged in the bot changes that allow different editors to be considered / mentioned per eip type / category. To change the people mentioned you just edit the yml file / string. https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/.github/workflows/auto-merge-bot.yml
